items.title: Generator Maintenance & Power Solutions
items.overview: We provide routine servicing of generators every 200 hours, ensuring optimal performance and reduced downtime. Our maintenance includes oil and filter changes, emergency response, and power audits.
items: Supply of parts from certified vendors

items.title: Electrical & Plumbing Systems
items.overview: We offer comprehensive maintenance for electrical and plumbing systems, ensuring safety and efficiency. Our services include inspections, repairs, and upgrades to prevent disruptions.
items: Supply of quality parts and fixtures

items.title: Borehole and Water Treatment
items.overview: We specialize in borehole servicing and water treatment plant maintenance, ensuring clean and reliable water supply. Our approach includes regular checks, filtration, and quality testing.
items: Supply of treatment chemicals and parts

items.title: Lift and HVAC Servicing
items.overview: We provide expert servicing for lifts and HVAC systems, focusing on safety and comfort. Our maintenance covers lubrication, testing, and energy-efficient upgrades.

items.title: Power Systems Installation
items.overview: We handle professional installation of power systems, ensuring seamless integration and reliability. Our services include site assessments, wiring, and commissioning.

items.title: Office & Facility Cleaning
items.overview: We deliver thorough cleaning services for offices and facilities, maintaining hygiene and appearance. Our approach includes daily routines, deep cleans, and eco-friendly products.

items.title: Façade and Glass Cleaning
items.overview: We specialize in façade and glass cleaning, ensuring spotless exteriors and interiors. Our services use safe methods, high-reach equipment, and streak-free results.

items.title: Refuse & Waste Disposal
items.overview: We manage refuse and waste disposal efficiently, promoting sustainability. Our services include collection, recycling, and compliance with regulations.

items.title: Drainage and Septic Tank Maintenance
items.overview: We provide maintenance for drainage and septic systems, preventing blockages and overflows. Our services include pumping, inspections, and odor control.

items.title: Manned Security Services
items.overview: We offer manned security services with trained personnel, ensuring protection and peace of mind. Our approach includes patrols, access control, and incident response.

items.title: CCTV Installation & Monitoring
items.overview: We install and monitor CCTV systems for enhanced surveillance. Our services cover high-definition cameras, remote access, and footage analysis.

items.title: Fire Equipment Maintenance
items.overview: We maintain fire equipment to ensure compliance and readiness. Our services include inspections, refills, and testing of alarms and extinguishers.

items.title: Access Control Systems
items.overview: We install and maintain access control systems for secure entry. Our solutions include keycards, biometrics, and integration with security networks.

items.title: Gardening & Landscaping
items.overview: We provide gardening and landscaping services to enhance outdoor spaces. Our maintenance includes planting, pruning, and seasonal care.

items.title: Swimming Pool Maintenance
items.overview: We offer swimming pool maintenance for clean and safe pools. Our services include chemical balancing, filtration, and equipment repairs.

items.title: Painting & Carpentry
items.overview: We handle painting and carpentry tasks for facility enhancements. Our work ensures durable finishes and custom woodworking.

items.title: Fixture and Appliance Maintenance
items.overview: We maintain fixtures and appliances to extend their lifespan. Our services include repairs, calibrations, and energy-efficient upgrades.

items.title: Procurement Services
items.overview: We provide procurement services for facility needs, ensuring cost-effective sourcing. Our approach includes vendor selection, negotiation, and delivery.

items.title: Handyman Staff Provision
items.overview: We supply trained handyman staff for on-site tasks. Our services ensure reliable personnel for repairs, installations, and daily maintenance.

items.title: Tenancy & Service Charge Management
items.overview: We manage tenancy and service charges for smooth operations. Our services include billing, collections, and dispute resolution.

items.title: Lease Negotiation Support
items.overview: We offer support for lease negotiations, ensuring favorable terms. Our expertise covers contract reviews, renewals, and legal compliance.
